business_unit.description: The business unit associated with the requisition.

requester_id.description: The ID of the individual or department requesting the items.

status.description: The current status of the requisition (e.g., Pending, Approved).

requested_by.description: The full name of the person who requested the items.

currency.description: The currency used for all monetary values in the requisition (e.g., DOP, USD).

requisition_name.description: A descriptive name for the requisition.

entered_date.description: The date the requisition was entered. Format: MM/DD/YY.

requisition_total.description: The total monetary value of all items in the requisition.

header_comments.description: General comments or notes pertaining to the entire requisition.

lines.description: A list of individual line items included in the requisition.

line_number.description: The sequential number for the line item.

item_description.description: A detailed description of the item being requested.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item requested.

unit_of_measure.description: The unit of measure for the requested quantity (e.g., UND for units).

price.description: The unit price of the item.

line_total.description: The total monetary value for this specific line item (quantity * price).

line_status.description: The status of this individual line item (e.g., Pending).

line_comments.description: Specific comments or notes for this line item, often containing URLs or additional details.

ship_line_number.description: The sequential number for the shipment detail within the line item.

ship_to.description: The name or code of the location where the item should be shipped.

attention.description: The name of the person or department to whose attention the shipment should be directed.

due_date.description: The requested delivery date for the shipment. Format: MM/DD/YY.

freight_terms.description: The terms governing the freight charges (e.g., CF_001).

ship_via.description: The method or carrier used for shipping (e.g., TERRESTRE).

shipping_address.description: The physical address for the shipment.

street.description: The street address of the shipping location.

city.description: The city of the shipping location.

country.description: The country of the shipping location.

shipping_quantity.description: The quantity of the item being shipped in this specific shipment.

shipping_total.description: The total monetary value for this specific shipment.

distribution_number.description: The sequential number for the distribution detail within the line item.

status.description: The status of the distribution (e.g., Open).

location.description: The location code associated with the distribution.

quantity.description: The quantity allocated to this distribution.

percentage.description: The percentage of the line item's total allocated to this distribution.

amount.description: The monetary amount allocated to this distribution.

gl_unit.description: The General Ledger unit for this distribution.

account.description: The account code for this distribution.

department.description: The department code for this distribution.

operating_unit.description: The operating unit for this distribution.

open_amount_quantity.description: The open amount quantity for this distribution.

gl_base_amount.description: The General Ledger base amount for this distribution.

currency.description: The currency of the GL base amount.

profile_id.description: The profile ID associated with the distribution.

sequence.description: The sequence number for the distribution.

capitalize.description: Indicates whether the item should be capitalized (Y for true, N for false).
